Data: Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run length ball, pushed for a single
Dilshan to Bailey, 1 run full delivery, Bailey hits that to long on
Dilshan to Hughes, no run length ball, defended square into the on side
Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run pushed wide of mid on and the batsmen take one
Dilshan to Bailey, 1 run worked off the legs into a gap, square on the leg side
Dilshan to Hughes, no run Hughes gets forward and pushes a fullish ball to short cover
Kulasekara to Bailey, no run length wide off off stump, Bailey punches that straight to point
Kulasekara to Bailey, no run full ball well wide of off stump again, Bailey defends to the off side
Kulasekara to Bailey, no run full and angled in towards the stumps, driven to mid on
Kulasekara to Bailey, no run angled in again, and Bailey defends this to the off side
Kulasekara to Bailey, no run length outside off stump, Bailey leaves that alone
Kulasekara to Bailey, no run angled in again, Bailey punches that one, but straight to the cover fielder, and Kulasekara gets in on a maiden
Dilshan to Hughes, 2 runs Full ball on the stumps, pushed square of mid on, Malinga chases after it, stops it with his boot, but allows two
Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run full outside off stump, driven with intent by Hughes, but short cover gets a hand on it and keeps it to one
Dilshan to Bailey, no run pitched on middle and straightens, Bailey gets a thick outside edge into the infield
Dilshan to Bailey, 1 run shuffles down the pitch and punches that to long off
Dilshan to Hughes, no run length outside off stump, pushed into the off side, but straight to a fielder
Dilshan to Hughes, 1 run length outside off again, this time Hughes finds a gap with his push
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run Length ball outside off stump, a touch of movement, and that goes through to the keeper
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run tighter on the stumps and fuller, Hughes defends that into the off side
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run very wide length ball, Hughes moves across to cut it but doesn't time it as he would like. Dilshan misfields though and allows a single
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, no run length ball outside off stump, defended
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, no run big shout for lbw! it's hit Bailey on the knee roll and it may have been moving down the leg side as well. The appeal is turned down and Sri Lanka opt not to review,
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, no run length on the stumps, defended to the leg side
Malinga to Hughes, no run 130kph, length on off stump, Hughes shaped to hit that through the on side, but ends up defending it
Malinga to Hughes, no run on off stump again, pushed into the square on the off side
Malinga to Hughes, no run full and outside off, Hughes drives it straight to mid off
Malinga to Hughes, 2 runs short, well outside off stump, Hughes plays that late and he gets it fine enough of third man to take two runs
Malinga to Hughes, no run length ball angled across him, hit to short cover
Malinga to Hughes, no run length outside off again, punched to cover
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, no run length outside off, pushed into the off side
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, FOUR runs full and on the pads, Bailey picks that up languidly and gets it over midwicket and to the fence, lovely shot.
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, no run length ball outside off again, and pushed into the off side

Angelo Mathews to Bailey, no run another appeal. This one for a caught behind, it was close to the inside edge, but there doesn't seem to be much in it. Could have been an lbw shout as well, but it hit the batsman outside off stump
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, 1 run pushed wide of mid on, and the batsmen scamper one
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run length ball outside off stump, Hughes opens the face and runs it to third man
Malinga to Hughes, no run short of a length ball outside off, defended on the back foot
Malinga to Hughes, no run fuller and on off stump, pushed into the infield defensively
Malinga to Hughes, no run length on off stump again, Hughes pushes at it and the batsmen consider a run, but decide against it
Malinga to Hughes, no run length ball on middle stump, knocked down into the leg side
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run length wide of off stump, Hughes goes back and punches this through the gap on the off side to the deep cover fielder
Malinga to Bailey, no run 142kph, fast, tailing yorker. Bailey just got his bat down in time on that one, as it honed in on leg stump. A yelp from Malinga.
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run length wide of off stump, Hughes punches that with intent, but Dilshan fields it at backward point
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run length ball again, Hughes comes forward to push it to extra cover
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, FOUR runs pierces the field, and this runs to the cover fence. Fullish ball outside off, and Hughes comes forward and times it sweetly
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run pushed into the leg side, and the batsmen take a quick single
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, no run driven straight, but the ball hits the stumps at the other end and deflects straight to mid on
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, 1 run length ball, angled slightly in to Bailey, He opens the face and hits that behind square for one
Malinga to Bailey, no run full and tailing again, pushed to mid on
Malinga to Bailey, no run Malinga's got his yorkers humming now, this one was right in the block hole and swinging towards leg stump. Assured defence from Bailey though.
Malinga to Bailey, no run length on off stump. Bailey defends that back to the bowler. Malinga's operating at around 140kph.
Malinga to Bailey, no run slower ball outside off stump, pushed to point
Malinga to Bailey, no run another tailing full delivery, hits the inside of Bailey's bat and goes to mid on
Malinga to Bailey, no run full, fast and tailing again. Bailey drives at it but can't get any power in the shot. Mid off fields and Malinga has his first maiden.
Herath to Hughes, no run flighted and pitched outside off stump, Hughes strides forward in defence
Herath to Hughes, no run flighted again, Hughes shuffles up and kills the spin
Herath to Hughes, no run a smidge shorter here, and Hughes hangs back. It beats his outside edge
Herath to Hughes, no run fullish, pushed into the leg side
Herath to Hughes, no run full again, Hughes comes forward and pushes it back to Herath
Herath to Hughes, no run Herath has landed it almost on the same spot as his five previous balls. Pushed defensively into the off side
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, 2 runs a wide floater outside the off stump, Bailey drives that wide of the cover sweeper, who runs around and keeps it to two
Angelo Mathews to Bailey, 1 run short outside off stump, Bailey plays a controlled pull to deep square leg

Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run It's hit the stumps! But the bails didn't come off. Short again, and Hughes attempts a pull. The ball gets an under edge, dribbles onto the stumps, but not with enough force to dislodge the bails.
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 2 runs slower ball on leg stump, Hughes whips that off his pads and fine leg can't prevent two
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, FOUR runs lovely shot! Full and outside off stump, Hughes drives that past a diving mid off to the boundary
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run shortish, pulled well in front of square to the sweeper on the leg side
Herath to Hughes, 2 runs full and on leg stump, worked into the leg side, where a misfield allows a second run
Herath to Hughes, no run shorter and outside off stump, cut straight to point
Herath to Hughes, no run full and on the legs, Hughes whips that to square leg
Herath to Hughes, no run shuffles down the pitch and hits that back to the bowler
Herath to Hughes, 1 run floated right up there, Hughes whips it square on the leg side again, not fooled by the flight
Herath to Bailey, no run full, pitched on middle and straightening. Bailey defends.
Perera to Hughes, 1 run wide and short, Hughes cuts that hard, but straight to the deep fielder on the off side
Perera to Bailey, 1 run wide again, and full, Bailey drives away from his body and again the deep square fielder keeps it to one

Perera to Hughes, FOUR runs poor bowling from Perera, he's been all over the place so far. This one is way down leg side, Hughes gets some bat on it and it's down to the fine leg fence for a simple four
Perera to Hughes, 4 wide another wide one down the leg side, and even Chandimal can't stop this one. He gets a glove on it which prevents it from running to the boundary
Perera to Bailey, no run better from Perera, length ball outside off stump that's defended
Perera to Bailey, 2 runs full and outside off stump, Bailey beats the diving cover with a drive and a poor throw from Malinga means the batsman take two easily
Perera to Bailey, no run length outside off stump, the drive is stopped by cover this time
Herath to Hughes, no run length ball, pitched on middle but angled across, defended
Herath to Hughes, 1 run fuller, pitched on off stump, Hughes opens the face and gets a single to point
Herath to Bailey, no run full and on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Herath to Bailey, 1 run Bailey is down the pitch and drives that to long off. the batsmen think about two but decide against it
Herath to Hughes, 1 run a full ball is worked off the toes into the leg side
Herath to Bailey, no run full again, and driven - but straight to short cover
Perera to Hughes, no run full and on off stump, driven straight to the fielder
Perera to Hughes, no run pitched on middle, length ball. Hughes comes forward and defends
Perera to Hughes, FOUR runs super shot. Full from Perera, Hughes throws his hands at that one and times it superbly wide of mid off, all the way to the fence
Perera to Hughes, no run short of a length and Hughes attempts to cut that, but it's too close to his body
Perera to Hughes, no run length ball on middle stump, hit back to the bowler
Perera to Hughes, no run length ball angled across Hughes, the batsman tries to punch that into the off side but doesn't time it
Herath to Bailey, no run full and on off stump, driven to the fielder
Herath to Bailey, 1 run full, but slightly on the pads and Bailey knocks that down to long on for one
Herath to Hughes, 1 run full again, outside off stump, Hughes punches that to deep cover and thinks about the second, but opts out
Herath to Bailey, no run pitched on middle stump, Bailey defends
Herath to Bailey, no run flighted and pitched wide of off stump, Bailey jams it into the pitch
Herath to Bailey, no run the batsman advances, but Herath pulls his length back a touch and Bailey can only defend that one back to Herath
Perera to Hughes, no run Length on off stump, defended into the off side
Perera to Hughes, no run length on middle stump, watchfully played again
Perera to Hughes, 1 run pushed into the off side for one

Perera to Bailey, OUT would you believe it? Perera has conjured a wicket out of nowhere. Fullish ball, seemed to hang in the pitch for a moment and Bailey was too quick on the shot. He ends up lobbing that straight back to the bowler, who takes a decent catch, bending low on his follow through.
Perera to Hussey, no run Length ball, outside off stump. Hussey flashes a cut but doesn't get anything on it
Perera to Hussey, no run 135kph, Full and outside off. Driven by Hussey, but straight to the short cover.
Herath to Hughes, no run drifted way wide of off stump, Hughes steps out and defends
Herath to Hughes, no run he goes back, and cuts this one, but straight to the fielder
Herath to Hughes, no run full and on his legs, pushed to mid on
Herath to Hughes, no run full and on leg stump again, Hughes turns that to square leg but can't beat the fielder
Herath to Hughes, no run this one slides across Hughes and beats his outside edge. Chandimal lets out a little yelp. He's kept well today
Herath to Hughes, no run full and on the legs again, Hughes can't pierce the legside ring
Malinga to Hussey, 3 runs tailing full ball, but it's overpitched and Hussey swings that on to the leg side for three. Just a touch too short from Malinga
Malinga to Hughes, no run this time he gets the yorker right, Hughes just gets his bat down in time. The ball was heading towards leg stump
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run full ball angled across Hughes, the batsman drives but gets a thick outside edge which goes safely to third man
Malinga to Hussey, no run full tailing yorker at 141kph. Hussey blocks that into the off side.
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run fullish again, Hussey gets that through the off side infield for a single
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run Another yorker, Hughes' bat comes down a little early and he gets a leading edge, but the ball scoots along the ground to third man.
Herath to Hughes, 1 run full and on off stump, Hughes punches it to long on
Herath to Hussey, 2 runs length ball on the pads, Hussey goes back to whip that to the deep fielder on the leg side
Herath to Hussey, 1 run fullish, punched to sweeper cover this time
Herath to Hughes, FOUR runs Hughes comes down the pitch and drives that nicely past cover for four. Great shot and it seems like he is sick of being bowled to. That's his 50 as well.
Herath to Hughes, no run full delivery, hit to mid off
Herath to Hughes, no run slightly shorter and turned into the leg side, but to the fielder
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run Short ball, Hussey climbs nicely on top of that one and pulls it into the deep
Malinga to Hughes, no run fullish ball, driven to mid off
Malinga to Hughes, no run full toss, searching for the yorker, and Hughes drives that to mid on again. Australia are looking to keep the score moving quickly here.
Malinga to Hughes, 2 runs full and outside off stump, Hughes drives that past cover and the sweeper comes around to cut it off in the deep
Malinga to Hughes, no run another leading edge off a yorker, but Hughes didn't get enough bat on it for the ball to carry to the fielder.
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run slower ball, length on leg stump, Hughes whips that around to the deep square leg.
Herath to Hughes, no run Full and on off stump, defended back down the pitch
Herath to Hughes, no run a tad shorter and straightening, Hughes defends again

Herath to Hughes, 2 runs Hughes had no idea about that one. Shuffles down the pitch a little, but Herath fires it full and fast and Hughes manages to get his bat down and gets an outside edge past the keeper
Herath to Hughes, no run full and on the legs, hit to short midwicket
Herath to Hughes, no run comes down the pitch and whips it to midwicket again. Herath is all over him, but Hughes isn't about to give it away.
Herath to Hughes, no run a little shuffle down the pitch again, and Hughes defends this one to the off side as Herath pares back the length a shade
Perera to Hussey, 2 runs length and outside off stump, Hussey slots that softly to the offside and the batsmen scamper a second
Perera to Hussey, 1 run fullish and on leg stump, hit wide of mid on and the batsmen take another quick run
Perera to Hughes, 2 runs wide and full, driven hard into the off side and the sweeper runs around to cut it off
Perera to Hughes, no run wide of off stump, Hughes goes back and cuts well, but Dilshan makes a diving save at backward point
Perera to Hughes, 1 run wide of off sump again, Hughes cuts in front of square this time and hits a gap
Perera to Hussey, no run length outside off, punched into the square on the off side
Herath to Hughes, 1 run length ball, whipped into the leg side for a single
Herath to Hussey, 1 run Full and outside off, driven into the vacant off side
Herath to Hughes, 1 run full and wide, Hughes advances and jams down on that one. Gets it wide of backward point to take one
Herath to Hussey, 1 run punched down the ground, and Herath can't stop that
Herath to Hughes, FOUR runs great shot! Shuffles down again and gets to the pitch of the ball, throws his hands at it and beats sweeper cover, having timed it nicely
Herath to Hughes, 1 run pushed into the offside for one. These two have done a good job of injecting a little life into the run rate.
Perera to Hughes, no run wide and short, but Hughes finds a diving Dilshan with his cut
Perera to Hughes, 1 run length outside off stump, that's been hit into the deep on the off side
Perera to Hussey, 1 run length on the legs, turned into the legside where the deep fielder runs around to collect
Perera to Hughes, 1 run Hughes waits on a wide-ish delivery outside off stump and gets it fine of a diving Dilshan for one
Perera to Hussey, no run length outside off stump, defended
Perera to Hussey, FOUR runs full on middle stump and that's been driven powerfully down the ground. Perera can't get a hand on it and it zooms to the straight fence with two men giving chase.
Herath to Hughes, no run Fullish and on off stump, Hughes hits back to the bowler
Herath to Hughes, 1 run down the track and Hughes whips that to the leg side
Herath to Hussey, 1 run pitched on middle stump and straightening slightly, Hussey hits that to long on
Herath to Hughes, 1 run pushed into the off side, where it's fielded well to prevent a second run
Herath to Hussey, 1 run fullish again, and driven unfussily down to long off
Herath to Hughes, no run big lbw appeal as Herath gets one to turn into Hughes from off stump, but it's turned down quickly. That was probably missing leg.
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run full and tailing, Hussey gets that wide of mid on and scampers a quick single. A shy at the stumps, but Hussey would have been home anyway.
Malinga to Hughes, FOUR runs poor ball, don't bowl there to Hughes. Wide and short, Hughes murders that through Dilshan at backward point and to the fence
Malinga to Hughes, no run tailing yorker, dug out watchfully
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run full toss outside off stump, Hughes drives that straight to deep cover
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run full and just outside off, driven down the ground
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run Hughes backs away to make room, but Malinga follows him with an attempted yorker. The batsman manages to get it away into the off side for one though.
Herath to Hughes, 1 run full ball, driven straight back but Herath misfields it
Herath to Hussey, no run full and pitched on middle stump, hit straight back to Herath
Herath to Hussey, no run a tad shorter this time and outside off stump, Hussey hits back to the bowler again
Herath to Hussey, no run in the blockhole, and Hussey just digs that one out
Herath to Hussey, 1 run pitched on middle stump and Hussey manages to get that one past Herath and to long on.
Herath to Hughes, 1 run pitched on middle stump again and turned just wide of mid on for a quick single.
Malinga to Hughes, FOUR runs poor full toss outside off stump from Malinga and Hughes smacks that past point for a boundary
Malinga to Hughes, FOUR runs terrific shot. This was an attempted yorker on leg stump and Hughes opens his stance and whips that powerfully wide of mid on for a boundary
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run this one is worked into the leg side off the pads, and the batsmen scamper one
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run wide yorker, Hussey drives at that one. Doesn't time it, but gets it wide enough of mid on to get a single.
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run wide and full again, Hughes gets low and runs it off the blade for one
Malinga to Hussey, 1 wide attempted yorker fired down the leg side. Chandimal does well to collect.
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run another attempted yorker that's a tad too short. Hussey works that into the legside infield.
Kulasekara to Hussey, no run length on off stump, driven straight to cover
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run slower ball wide of off stump and a touch short. Huseey goes back to cut that into the square, and there is enough time to take one
Kulasekara to Hughes, 2 runs full and on the pads, Hughes whips that to the deep legside fielder
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run full toss outside off, Hughes runs down the pitch but can't get bat on it. Hughes is annoyed with himself for missing that, with the field up
Kulasekara to Hughes, 1 run length ball angled in. Hughes works that wide of mid on
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run slower ball on the stumps, punched to sweeper cover
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run Short of a length on the stumps, hit into the leg side, but to the midwicket fielder
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run fuller and on the stumps, hit slightly wide of Malinga at midwicket this time, and a single is taken
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, no run slower ball just short of a length. Hughes pushes that into the offside.
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run Hughes swipes across the line there, pulling the ball from way outside off stump to the deep midwicket fielder
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run length ball on the stumps, pushed into the leg side for one
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run fullish and on off stump, pushed to long on for a single
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run delivered from wide of the crease, angled in. Hughes gets an inside edge on that
Kulasekara to Hughes, 1 run full and on the stumps, Hughes comes down the track and squeezes it into the gap on the off side and to deep cover
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run full toss on middle stump, Hussey whips that to deep midwicket
Kulasekara to Hughes, 1 run slower ball, 102kph, Hughes advances and has a swing at at that. Gets it to go to deep midwicket off a mishit.
Kulasekara to Hussey, 1 run full and on the toes, Hussey drives to long on for one

Kulasekara to Hughes, 1 run very short there, might have been a wide if Hughes left it alone. He gets his bat above his head and manages to control the shot down to fine leg. Five away from a hundred here, and he has increased his strike rate nicely.
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run fullish ball, hit straight to midwicket. Hughes scampers one, and may have been in trouble had the throw hit from Thirimanne.
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run outside off stump, goes through to the keeper
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, no run slower ball outside off stump, Hussey cuts it but can't beat Dilshan who dives to make the stop
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 2 runs angled into the pads, Hussey turns that towards deep square leg and the batsmen scamper two. Good running.
Angelo Mathews to Hussey, 1 run wide of off stump again, but Hussey bunts that down towards mid on for one. Picking the gaps nicely here
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 run length ball on the pads, Hughes whips that straight to the deep midwicket

Perera to Hughes, FOUR runs Hundred for Hughes! Short and wide from Perera, and that is cut hard by Hughes. He gets that through the backward point fielder, and to the fence. Good hundred and his second in the series.
Perera to Hughes, no run length on the pads, hit into the legside, but can't beat the fielder
Perera to Hughes, 2 runs fullish and on off stump, scooped over the infield on the offside
Perera to Hughes, 2 runs Hughes hits that hard into the legside this time, and there's enough time for a well-run two
Perera to Hughes, 1 run makes room and drives that hard, but Jeevan Mendis at mid on makes a superb diving save. Can't prevent the single though

Perera to Hussey, OUT Perera has conjured another wicket - a run out this time. Hussey hit that straight into the pitch and took off for a run that simply wasn't there, because the ball had only made it as far as the bowler. Hussey turned to return to his crease, but Perera was on target with the throw and Hussey
Malinga to Hughes, no run Slower ball first up. It's fullish and outside off stump. The batsman swings big, but can't get bat to it.
Malinga to Hughes, no run another slower ball outside off stump and Hughes is through the shot early again.
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run another slower ball angled across, but Hughes is wise to it this time. Strokes that to the sweeper cover and puts Maxwell on strike
Malinga to Maxwell, 2 runs attempted yorker that is again a little short. Maxwell clears the front leg and drills that to deep cover.

Malinga to Maxwell, 1 run slower short ball, and Maxwell gets away with a baseball-style bunt. He was shaping to pull that but realised it was too slow, and just hung the bat out. The ball took a top edge and landed safely in the infield

Malinga to Hughes, 1 run yet another slower ball and another one that almost yields a wicket. Hughes clears the front leg and tries to smash that through the offside, but is fooled by the lack of pace again. The mishit lands just short of cover
Kulasekara to Hughes, SIX runs big six first up. Hughes opens his stance and swings that overpitched delivery way over cow corner
Kulasekara to Hughes, 1 run hits that one square on the offside

Kulasekara to Maxwell, 1 run dropped! Tough chance though. Slower length ball outside off stump and Maxwell swings hard at that. Mahela at mid on gets fingertips to it as he attempts to pull the ball down, but he can't hold the catch. Saves a boundary though.
Kulasekara to Hughes, 2 runs full and straight, driven down the ground
Kulasekara to Hughes, 1 run full again, hit towards long on for one
Kulasekara to Maxwell, 1 run full and on the stumps, hit to extra cover for one
Malinga to Maxwell, FOUR runs full toss on the stumps, Maxwell makes room and he smashes that through the packed offside right field to the boundary. Australia out to hurt Sri Lanka here.
Malinga to Maxwell, no run advances and makes room, but it's a slower ball outside off stump and he's through the shot way too early
Malinga to Maxwell, 1 leg bye slower short ball, and he's through the shot early again. Hits him on the side and the batsmen take a leg bye
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run slower ball again, fuller this time. Hughes carves that to deep point.
Malinga to Maxwell, no run slower again, short outside off stump and Hughes drags that onto the leg side, but straight to the fielder at a straight-ish midwicket

Malinga to Maxwell, OUT another slower ball, an full. Maxwell trying to smash that over the top, but he's undone by the lack of pace again, and this time the top edge sails high enough for a fielder to settle under it at extra cover.
Angelo Mathews to Henriques, 1 run wide and short, Henriques hits that into the deep on the offside and turns the strike over
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 2 runs Hughes makes room and hits a length ball on the stumps wide of deep cover for a couple

Angelo Mathews to Hughes, FOUR runs a slower ball again but Hughes is reading them well now. Length and on the stumps, and Hughes swings that onto the leg side. Goes flat and fast and almost over the fence.
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, FOUR runs beautifully played. Full and outside off, Hughes just gets low and directs that fine of short third man for four. He's playing a gem here.
Angelo Mathews to Hughes, 1 leg bye short ball, and I think that was the slower one, Hughes can't get bat on it and it hits him. The batsmen take a leg bye
Angelo Mathews to Henriques, 1 run fullish ball, hit to mid off
Malinga to Henriques, 1 run slower ball again and Henriques just knocks that into the off side and gets Hughes on strike
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run Short of a length outisde off stump, punched to deep cover
Malinga to Henriques, 1 run slow and on the stumps again, turned into the on side for one.
Malinga to Hughes, 1 run slow again, Hughes tries to cut it but gets and under edge. The batsmen scamper a single and there's a chance of an overthrow, but Hughes can't turn in time.
Malinga to Henriques, no run 139kph, full and hit straight to the backward point fielder
Malinga to Henriques, 1 run slower again, and full outside off. Henriques gets a top edge, but it lands well short of third man
Kulasekara to Henriques, 2 runs full toss on the stumps, drilled wide of long on, and the batsmen take two
Kulasekara to Henriques, 1 run full and on the stumps again, hit to long off, but to the fielder this time.
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run length ball, and a charging Hughes can only get that as far as the bowler. Retreats quickly to the crease.
Kulasekara to Hughes, FOUR runs full toss angled in, Hughes stays deep in his crease and swings that over midwicket and to the legside fence.
Kulasekara to Hughes, 3 runs very well timed straight drive there to an overpitched delivery on the stumps. Thisara Perera runs around to cut it off just short of the boundary.
Kulasekara to Henriques, 1 run full again and drilled hard to sweeper cover. Just a single off the last ball.
Join us in a bit for Sri Lanka's innings. They've been patchy with the bat in this series, so it could be an interesting finish.

Super finish from Australia, who at one stage looked like they mightn't make 220. Hughes guided the innings brilliantly with an unbeaten 138. The pitch is a slow one, so this won't be an easy run chase.
Jayawardene and Dilshan are at the crease for Sri Lanka. Clint McKay has the ball.
Welcome back for what should hopefully be an absorbing chase.
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball outside off stump, lovely shape away, Mahela leaves it alone
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run on the pads, back of a length, Mahela turns that into the legside, thinks about a run and reconsiders
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs leans on a languid straight drive off an overpitched delivery on the stumps, not hit hard enough to get a boundary, but the batsmen run two
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length outside off stump, Mahela is nicely behind it
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full again, and straight driven. This time mid off is straighter, and Mahela can't beat the fielder
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball angled into the stumps, pushed into the leg side
Starc to Dilshan, 1 wide wild start there, Starc coming in from over the wicket lets one go way wide of Dilshan's off stump. That was heading to first slip
Starc to Dilshan, no run angled across again, tighter into the stumps this time. dilshan leaves it alone
Starc to Dilshan, 1 run fuller and closer to the stumps again, driven into the infield and the batsmen take one
Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, no run shorter and outside off stump, punched to the point fielder
Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs lovely timing from Mahela, Overpitched from Starc and the batsmen hits that over short mid on, and that's Sri Lanka's first boundary
Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full and wide of off stump, tries to jam that into the off side but misses
Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, no run steps forward and pushes that length delivery gently to the offside
McKay to Dilshan, no run full and on the stumps, Dilshan defends back to the bowler
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run full and straying slightly onto the pads this time. Dilshan clips it square on the leg side
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball angled in, defended into the off side
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run full and straight again, and Jayawardene works that to the leg side
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run again McKay bowls on the pads and Dilshan gets it square on the on side again.
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fullish and outside off, Mahela is forward to defend
Starc to Dilshan, no run back of a length and into the body, Dilshan knocks that into the leg side and takes off, but is turned back quickly by his partner
Starc to Dilshan, no run fullish and swinging in, the ball hits Dilshan on the pad and sparks a big appeal, but it seemed to be going down leg. Seems to have been an inside edge as well.
Starc to Dilshan, no run short of a length on off stump, Dilshan punches that into the square
Starc to Dilshan, 2 runs short and on the leg side, Dilshan gets glove one it and takes two as the ball rolls past the keeper
Starc to Dilshan, no run on the legs again and seaming in to Dilshan a tad. He tries to whip that away to the leg side, but can't get bat on it
Starc to Dilshan, no run fullish again and on the stumps, Dilshan gets a thick inside edge and is interested in taking a run, but Mahela isn't
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run wide and a little bit short. Mahela cuts that nicely but can't beat David Warner at backward point. Dilshan is sent back again.
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run angled well into the body and back of a length. Tucked into the leg side, but not well enough to beat the fielder
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs too far down leg side this time. back of a length again. That collects Mahela's inside edge and the thigh pad and rolls to the fine leg fence
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run runs down the pitch, but can't do much with the length ball that McKay has bowled
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs nicely picked up there. McKay was full and straight, Jayawardene steps across and lifts that over midwicket for four

McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs and that's the best shot so far. Not a lot wrong with the ball - it was length outside off stump. Mahela leans into a cover drive and places it well enough to thread the field. Great timing.
Starc to Dilshan, 2 leg byes leg side again, and Dilshan glances it down to fine leg
Starc to Dilshan, no run this one is length on off stump and Dilshan hits that to cover
Starc to Dilshan, 1 run back to the leg-stump line. Dilshan works the full ball off his legs into the deep

Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, (no ball) FOUR runs and a super stroke again. Lovely batting here, but poor bowling as well. Starc floats one up well wide of off stump and Mahela gets down to square drive that past a diving Warner
Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, no run yorker in the blockhole, Mahela makes room, but can't get it past cover
Starc to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run length outside off stump, run down to third man for one
Starc to Dilshan, no run Angles a length-ball into Dilshan, who defends it to the off side
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run length and on the pads, Mahela tucks that into the leg side
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run full and on the stumps, dug out wide of mid on and Dilshan scampers a single
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run back of a length, tucked into the on side again
McKay to Dilshan, no run length outside off stump, pushed to point
McKay to Dilshan, no run back of a length and outside off, Dilshan defends to short cover
McKay to Dilshan, no run back of a length and angled in again, Dilshan is watchful in defence
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run wide of off stump, run off the open blade to third man
Johnson to Dilshan, no run short and angled across, Dilshan tries to pull but misses
Johnson to Dilshan, no run length and on the stumps, Dilshan hits this back with a straight bat
Johnson to Dilshan, no run back of a length, on the legs. Dilshan turns it to the leg side, but finds midwicket
Johnson to Dilshan, no run there's that booming drive. Johnson floats it up, and Dilshan winds up and lets fly, but can only manage an inside edge. Shades of his MCG dismissal in the first innings,
Johnson to Dilshan, no run length ball angled across, defended back to the bowler
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run fullish and angled in to off stump, turned into a gap on the leg side
McKay to Dilshan, 1 run short of a length on off stump, cut into the square and it's wide enough of the fielder to get a run
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide angled too far down the leg side.
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length outside off stump, defended into the off side
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs not far from the short fine leg fielder, but safe enough. McKay strays on the legs again and Mahela clips that aerially behind square for four
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fullish, outside off stump. Mahela drives but can't beat mid on
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full, straight and driven again, but not well enough to yield a run
Johnson to Dilshan, no run short of a length on off stump, Dilshan thrashes at that one, but doesn't time it
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 run just a little wide of off stump and short, Dilshan cuts that into the square the batsmen scamper one
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs back of a length, not much width, but Mahela plays that late and gets it square of fine leg for two. Timing it beautifully at the moment.
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run 129kph, full and on the stumps. Pushed into a leg side gap for one.
Johnson to Dilshan, no run full and on off stump, Dilshan drives and times it well, but it's straight to Hughes at short cover
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 run length ball wide of off stump, Dilshan carves that behind point and long leg runs around to keep it to one
Doherty to Dilshan, no run full toss to start, but Dilshan can't put it away, hitting it to mid wicket
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run full and on the legs, Dilshan gets it down the ground
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run on leg stump and full again, turned backward of square
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run full, on off stump, driven to long off
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run shorter and wide of off stump, Mahela goes back to cut, but hits it to backward point
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run length ball outside off stump, Mahela gets the forward press working and strokes it to deep cover
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fullish and on the stumps, clipped to short midwicket
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full and on the stumps again, Mahela straight drives, but Mitch gets a hand to it
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run full and outside off stump, driven to deep cover.
Johnson to Dilshan, 2 runs length ball on the stumps, worked square on the leg side
Johnson to Dilshan, no run short of a length and on the stumps, defended on the back foot
Johnson to Dilshan, no run length ball on off stump, defended straight

Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT that was somewhat out of the blue. Seems to have stuck in the pitch more than Mahela expected. He was aiming a shot through mid off, but gets an inside edge and it lobs to mid on, who takes a simple catch. Doherty delivers the breakthrough Australia needed.
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run full and on off stump, driven, but to short midwicket
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run length ball on the stumps, defended
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run length again, straying onto the pads, worked into the leg side
Doherty to Dilshan, no run pitches outside off and straightens, Dilshan defends
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run a little straighter this time, Dilshan knocks that into the off side and they scamper a single
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 leg bye length ball on Dilshan's pads, the batsman take a leg bye
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run short ball, 138kph, and the pitch is keeping low. Thirimanne ducks under it, but the ball bounces well short of the keeper.
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run length ball on the stumps, turned to square leg
Johnson to Thirimanne, 1 wide fired down leg side, Thirimanne can't get a touch on it
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run length on off stump, the batsman is forward in defence
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run length outside off stump, nicely behind it again
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run fuller this time, and outside off stump, but defended
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 leg bye on leg stump again, and that collects a pad on its way past Matthew Wade
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run length on off stump, and that's defended

Doherty to Thirimanne, OUT poor option from Thirimanne, and Sri Lanka are throwing away a decent start. He came down the pitch and tried to loft that over midwicket, only he hit it too straight and David Hussey at long on ran around to swallow it. It was the result of some good pressure, but he will feel that tha
Doherty to Dilshan, no run fired into off stump, hit to mid off
Doherty to Dilshan, no run fullish outside off stump, Dilshan hits that back towards Doherty
Doherty to Dilshan, no run fullish and on off stump, and pushed back at the bowler
Henriques to Chandimal, no run full and on the stumps, Chandimal gets behind it
Henriques to Chandimal, 1 run fullish and on the pads, Chandimal turns that backward of square
Henriques to Dilshan, no run full and outside off stump, Dilshan pushes that into the infield
Henriques to Dilshan, 1 run full and on off stump, driven to deep cover
Henriques to Chandimal, FOUR runs length ball outside off stump and that's nicely dabbed by Chanidmal, plays it really late and runs it down to the third man fence
Henriques to Chandimal, no run 134kph, length ball, defended
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run full and pitched outside off, driven to long off
Doherty to Chandimal, no run fulish on off stump, poked away to the off side
Doherty to Chandimal, no run full and on off stump, driven straight to short cover
Doherty to Chandimal, no run very full again, and Chandimal hits the short cover fielder once more
Doherty to Chandimal, no run again, Chandimal drives a full ball, but finds the fielder
Doherty to Chandimal, no run he defends this time, and this is getting a little repetitive for short cover, who collects
Henriques to Dilshan, 2 runs length outside off, run down to third man off the open blad
Henriques to Dilshan, no run tighter into the stumps, defended to point

Henriques to Dilshan, OUT Henriques strikes! Dislhan edges an innocuous delivery behind, and leaves Sri Lanka in trouble. He hasn't looked himself at all in this innings and has taken 48 balls for 19. Pressure on the young middle order now, and Australia will feel they are on top now, the way the pitch is playing
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, 1 run back of a length and at the body, turned into the leg side to get off the mark
Henriques to Chandimal, no run fullish on off stump, pushed into the off side
Henriques to Chandimal, no run full and on off stump, driven to short cover
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run full and on leg stump, tapped away to the leg side
Doherty to Chandimal, no run Chandimal advances and blocks that one to short cover
Doherty to Chandimal, no run same ball, and same stroke. Chandimal down the pitch and defends again
Doherty to Chandimal, no run down the track again, can't get it past short cover this time either
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run sits back this time, and it's thrown up slightly wider. Chandimal cuts that into the deep
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run Mathews stays in his crease and punches a length ball on off stump to deep cover
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, no run full and on off stump, hit straight back to the bowler
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball on off stumps, Mathews tries to work that to the leg side on the back foot, but hits it too straight
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, no run length on off stump, defended by Mathews
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, no run fuller delivery, hit back to the bowler again who deflects the ball onto the stumps at the non-striker's Chandimal was home though
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, 1 run Mathews comes down the pitch and tries to hit a back-of-a-length ball through cover, but gets an inside edge and they take a single
Henriques to Chandimal, no run that stayed low as well. Chandimal tried to pull that but it took an under edge back onto his pads
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run shortish ball, hit to deep cover for a single
Doherty to Chandimal, no run Chandimal comes down the pitch and drives, but finds Doherty
Doherty to Chandimal, no run shuffles down the pitch again and defends
Doherty to Perera, no run length ball pitched on leg stump, knocked into the on side
Doherty to Perera, no run pitches on off and straightens, Perera defends
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, no run fullish wide of off stump, driven to mid on
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball outside off stump, defended into the off side
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, 1 run length on off stump, Mathews hangs back and gets that square on the leg side
Henriques to Perera, no run Full toss on the stumps, nicely struck by Perera, but it's stopped brilliantly at short midwicket
Henriques to Perera, no run length on off stump, Perera comes forward to defend
Henriques to Perera, no run length ball wide of off stump, but it keeps very low, and sneaks below Perera's cut shot. Batting becoming very difficult here.
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run fullish, defended into the off side
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run full ball, driven to long off
Doherty to Perera, no run length on leg stump, hit straight to short fine leg
Doherty to Perera, 1 run leg stump line again and straightening, but hit to midwicket which allows a run
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run pitching outside off stump and straightening, Mathews is forward in defence
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run Mathews comes forward to defend again, and Wade lets out a long, lone appeal. Umpire not interested. I think that hit bat first, before striking pad
Starc to Perera, 1 run full and outside off stump, Perera drives and gets an inside edge down to fine leg
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run full and angled pitched on middle stump, Mathews defends
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run full and on the stumps again, defended into the off side
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run Angled into Mathews, who defends again
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs turns a length ball into the leg side, and the batsman scamper a tight two as Doherty steams in from fine leg
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run full, almost a yorker. Mathews digs it out.
Maxwell to Perera, no run Perera down the pitch and digs it out to mid on.
Maxwell to Perera, 1 run fullish again, this time Perera stays back and works it into the leg side off his pads
Maxwell to Angelo Mathews, no run fullish on off stump, Mathews hits it to mid on
Maxwell to Angelo Mathews, 1 run full again, this time Mathews drives and a misfield at short cover allows a single
Maxwell to Perera, no run goes back and cuts a wide delivery, but straight to the fielder
Maxwell to Perera, no run length ball, pushed into the off side
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 1 run works that off his legs to deep midwicket
Starc to Perera, no run another fine cut shot from Perera off a short, wide ball but he can't find the gap
Starc to Perera, no run lovely delivery from Starc. A tiny bit of late swing means the full delivery just outside off stump beats the batsman's inside edge.
Starc to Perera, no run swing into the batsman again, and Perera's cover drive is inside edged onto his pads
Starc to Perera, no run angled in to just outside off stump, Perera is nicely behind a length ball
Starc to Perera, no run angled in again and full. Perera pushes that to mid on. Just one run off that over. Pressure building big here for Sri Lanka.
Maxwell to Angelo Mathews, no run forward to defend that fullish delivery into the off side
Maxwell to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs Mathews runs down the track and lofts that one past the bowler towards the straight fence
Maxwell to Angelo Mathews, no run goes back to cut, but finds the fielder
Maxwell to Angelo Mathews, no run hit into the off side, straight to the fielder
Maxwell to Angelo Mathews, 1 run works that length ball off his pads behind square
Maxwell to Perera, 1 run Perera gets a short ball, and he pulls it into the deep, but to the fielder
Starc to Perera, 1 leg bye angled down the leg side and that is glanced to fine leg for a single
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run wide of off stump from around the wicket. Mathews goes for a big drive but doesn't make contact with the full delivery.
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run 144kph, and banged in short. Mathews tries to pull it but it goes under his bat again. This pitch is really dying.
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run angled into the off stump and Mathews gets behind that.
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 1 run full and outside off, jammed down to third man for a run
Starc to Perera, no run length ball outside off stump, defended by Perera. Another good over for Australia.
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, no run length on the stumps, Mathews comes down the track and checks his shot when the length isn't there for him
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, 1 run length outside off stump, pushed to long on for a single

Henriques to Perera, FOUR runs that is a wild swipe but it gets Sri Lanka's fist boundary in a long time. Length ball again and Perera fetches that from outside off stump and sends it to the cow corner fence.
Henriques to Perera, no run length outside off stump, defended
Henriques to Perera, 1 run wide of off stump, hit to deep cover for one
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, 1 run length on middle stump, Mathews knocks that to the leg side for one
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 leg bye hits Mathews on the pads with a length ball and the batsman take a leg bye
Johnson to Perera, no run length ball outside off stump, hit to point
Johnson to Perera, 1 run swings across the line again, and gets a big inside edge to fine leg
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run 128kph, short ball, Mathews tried to pull that but was through the shot early and it hits him on the forearm
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run 140kph short ball this time, Mathews gets bat on it and controls the pull shot to deep midwicket
Johnson to Perera, 1 run length on the legs and whipped away to long leg for one
Henriques to Perera, 1 run Full and outside off stump, Perera gets a thick edge to third man
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, 1 run length ball on middle stump, stroked down to long on
Henriques to Perera, 1 run short, but not all that wide. Cut nicely nonetheless, but the fielder in the deep keeps it to one.
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, 1 run full and on off stump, Mathews mines that long on gap for one more
Henriques to Perera, 1 run length outside off stump, Perera drives it to the deep

Johnson to Perera, OUT gone! Johnson gets one to bounce a little more than they have and Perera gets a big top edge as he tries to work that into the leg side. David Warner at mid wicket waits for an eternity for it to come down, and takes the catch comfortably. Another big blow and Sri Lanka are sliding quickly
Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run angled into the pads and glanced away to fine leg
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run short ball, Mathews gets on top of that and gets it down to fine leg comfortably
Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, no run length outside off stump, Mendis is forward to defend
Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, no run length outside off stump again, and Mendis defends back to the bowler
Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, no run length ball on the wickets, Mendis turns that to the leg side and takes off, but is sent back by Mathews as Warner fields
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, no run Length ball outside off stump, pushed into the off side
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, 1 run length ball again, Mathews finds that gap to get a single to long on
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, no run back of a length, Mendis shuffles across his stumps and defends
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, no run angled into the batsman, and Mendis is cramped for space. Defends into the off side.
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, no run slower delivery, pushed to the off side again
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run length ball outside off stump, punched to deep cover
Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run angled into the pads, fullish delivery, turned into the leg side
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run full delivery outside off stump, dug out to mid off by Mathews
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run full on the stumps, Mathews whips that powerfully, but finds mid on
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run wide and angled across at 143kph, Mathews aims a cut short at that one but can't connect
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run length angled across the batsman, Mathews defends on the front foot
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run full and on the legs, Mathews tries to clip that square, but misses and the ball strikes his pads. One run off that over.
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, no run slower ball outside off stump, Mendis pokes at it but misses
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, no run length ball angled in towards off stump, defended on the front foot
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, no run length ball again, Mendis tries to open the face but can't beat point
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, no run defends a length ball on off stump to the leg side
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, no run length outside off stump again and Mendis hits that to point
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, no run and Henriques completes a maiden. Mendis gets that length ball on middle stump and pushes it to short midwicket.
Starc to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs the bowler goes wide of the crease and angles it in, but over pitches and Mathews pounces. He opens up his stance and goes inside out over cover for four.
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run angled in again, only fuller. Mathews can't do much with that one. Jams it into the pitch
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 1 run bouncer from Starc, and Mathews controls the hook shot to deep square leg
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, no run length outside off stump and Mendis comes forward to defend. Mathews needs him to play a few shots here.

Starc to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run shy at the stumps and he misses! Would have been out if he hit. Mendis turned a length ball to David Warner at mid on and his underarm throw just missed as the batsmen scampered one.
Starc to Angelo Mathews, no run back of a length on off stump and defended into the leg side. Only six from that over despite the boundary.
McKay to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run Shortish outside off stump, Mendis tries to pull but gets and under edge onto his pads and the batsman take a quick one
McKay to Angelo Mathews, no run slower ball, 110kph. Pitched it wide of off stump and Mathews defends that one.
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 1 run another slower ball, on the stumps this time, Mathews knocks it onto the off side and takes one
McKay to Jeevan Mendis, FOUR runs another slower ball, but this one is short and Mendis swivels around and pulls that over backward square leg to the vacant boundary
McKay to Jeevan Mendis, no run back of a length delivery. Mendis shuffles forward but can only defend it.

McKay to Jeevan Mendis, no run a slower ball outside off stump, and Mendis tries to run that off the blade, but can't beat short third man. Six off the over again. Not good enough for the visitors by a long shot.
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 1 wide fires one down the leg side
Starc to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs good shot from Mathews. That was in the slot from Starc, overpitched and outside off stump. Mathews just hammers him over mid off for four
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 1 run wide and full, Mathews opens the face and runs that to third man
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, no run length ball outside off stump, Mendis aims a swipe across the line but only gets an inside edge to midwicket
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run worked off the legs and Mendis gets down the other end
Starc to Angelo Mathews, 1 run full and outside off, jammed into the pitch and the batsmen scamper one
Starc to Jeevan Mendis, no run short ball, Mendis ducks under it
McKay to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs slower ball outside off the stump, Mathews goes for a lavish drive, gets an outside edge and that beats Wade on its way to the fence
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 1 leg bye slower again, back of a length, tucked into the leg side
McKay to Jeevan Mendis, no run short ball, slower again, and Mendis gets inside the line, but can't make contact with his pull
McKay to Jeevan Mendis, 1 leg bye tries to smash that away on the leg side but can't make decent contact. The batsman take a run after the ball dribbles onto the pitch
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 1 run one the pads from McKay, worked to midwicket
McKay to Jeevan Mendis, no run Mendis aims an expansive drive, but the bounce is lower than he expects and it scoots to the keeper
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run slower length ball on the pads, Mathews can't get bat to that
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run shortish and on leg stump, Mathews pulls but can't beat square leg
Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, FOUR runs Mendis finally gets hold of one. That was in the slot from Mitch and fast. Length outside off stump and that has been dispatched high over mid on.
Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run fast bouncer, Mendis gets that on the splice and it goes in the air, but lands safely at around midwicket
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs slower short ball again from Mitch, Mathews gets onto that quickly and smashes it in front of square for four. Nicely hit.

Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run length ball on the stumps, Mathews backs away but can't time his shot. Gets it as far as Warner in the covers who can't hit the stumps with an underarm throw again. Mathews might have been safe this time though.
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 1 run Mathews blocks a length ball on off stump into the infield and takes a single
McKay to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run length ball angled in from around the wicket, Mendis swings that one to deep midwicket for a single
McKay to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs slower length ball from McKay and Mathews murders that over midwicket for four. That's his fifty up too.
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs full ball hit hard back at McKay, who can only get a hand to it. The deflection allows a couple.
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 1 run length outside off stump, Mathews moves across the stumps and runs that to short third man.
McKay to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run slower ball again and it jumps off the surface a bit. Hits Mendis on the gloves and the batsmen scamper through

Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, 3 leg byes big appeal and a review! That was full and angled into leg stump and originally given runs, but the review shows that that only struck the boot. It was missing leg stump though, so no harm done for Sri Lanka. The batsmen have taken three to fine leg.
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs oho! Lovely shot from Mathews. In the slot from Mitch again, and Mathews swings that high over midwicket for four.
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run cut from close to the body, and Maxwell dives at point to save a run.
Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run yorker is squiurted backward of square on the off side by Mendis. Mathews back on strike.
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run short ball on off stump and Mathews can't time his pull. It goes straight to midwicket.
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs don't worry about the timing on that one. Mathews waits on the back foot for another short one, and mows that over wide mid on for four. Super shot.
Doherty to Jeevan Mendis, no run tossed wide of off stump, Mendis backed away and was nowhere near hitting that one.
Doherty to Jeevan Mendis, no run a huge slog sweep aimed by Mendis there, but can't hit it properly.
Doherty to Jeevan Mendis, no run another attempted sweep and another miss, as Doherty throws it up outside off stump
Doherty to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run a bit shorter from Doherty, Mendis turns it around the corner for one
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run another nicely flighted ball, Mathews pushes that into the off side for a single

Doherty to Jeevan Mendis, SIX runs and theres the release! Doherty had done so well so far in the over, but Mendis gets one back. Runs down the pitch and strikes it high and long into the sightscreen.
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, 1 run 123kph, length on middle stump, Mathews tries to smash that over mid on, but gets an inside edge onto his pads.
Henriques to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run length ball angled in from around the stump, Mendis whips that to deep midwicket for a single

Henriques to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs Mathews runs down the pitch and hits it aerially to cow corner, where there is a fielder now placed. The throw not collected though, and Sri Lanka get an overthrow.
Henriques to Angelo Mathews, 1 run a slog across the line again, but not timed. Just a single to midwicket
Henriques to Perera, no run In the blockhole and Perera can't do much with that. Great over Henriques.
Johnson to Kulasekara, 1 run slower ball outside off stump, strokes into the off side gap for a single
Johnson to Perera, FOUR runs slower ball in the slot for Perera, and he swings that over the infield, just wide of long on for four.
Johnson to Perera, no run length ball outside the off stump, sneaks under Perera's cut shot
Johnson to Perera, 2 runs wide of off stump again and Perera connects this time, as the sweeper runs around to cut it off
Johnson to Perera, 1 run cut hard again, but straight to the sweeper on the off side, Perera retains the strike
Henriques to Herath, 1 leg bye length ball on the pads, Herath gets bat to it and they scamper one
Henriques to Kulasekara, 1 run shortish ball outside off stump, Kulasekara clubs it down the ground
Henriques to Herath, 1 run full and on the stumps, Herath opens the face and sends that to point
Henriques to Kulasekara, no run slower ball outside off stump, Kulasekara tries to go inside out but misses
Henriques to Kulasekara, no run slower short ball again, and Kulasekara sways out of the way, having misread the pace initially
McKay to Herath, 1 run Full and on the stumps, Herath hits that back over the bowler's head but doesn't quite time it
McKay to Kulasekara, no run 107kph, Kualsekara advances but cant time his shot. Goes straight back to the bowler
McKay to Kulasekara, 1 run angled into the pads and Kulasekara misses again. Appeal from McKay, but the umpire's not interested.
McKay to Herath, no run slower ball again, angled into the stumps. Herath misses with his swing and the ball shaves the stumps
McKay to Kulasekara, no run yet another slower ball, Kulasekara, again, can't connect with a cut shot
Starc to Malinga, 1 run nasty short ball angled into Malinga, and it looks like it's hit him on the glove. They take a run, but the physio is out there immediately.
Starc to Kulasekara, 1 run full and angled in, Kulasekara knocks it down to long on
Starc to Malinga, 1 run angled into the blockhole. Malinga digs it out and the batsmen take one.
Starc to Kulasekara, 2 runs nicely flicked over short fine leg from Kulasekara, Picked up the short ball from leg stump and sent it high towards the boundary. The sweeper comes around to cut it off.
Starc to Kulasekara, FOUR runs fullish delivery on off stump, carved powerfully over the off side infield for four. Good shot. He's been trying it for a while
Starc to Kulasekara, 1 wide Kulasekara moves back, but Starc goes wide of the off stump. Wide is called, but it seems harsh as that was inside the tram lines.
Starc to Kulasekara, FOUR runs picked off his pads and timed well to the square leg fence. Another good shot, but coming too late for Sri Lanka, you feel
McKay to Malinga, no run a slower ball outside off stump, Malinga can't get bat to it
McKay to Malinga, no run slower ball again, bounces just over the stumps. Malinga's cross-bat swipe gets nowhere near it.
McKay to Malinga, 1 wide loses control of that one, down the leg side

So Australia have leveled it up. Mahela may feel he chose wrongly at the toss, given how difficult the pitch became for scoring in the second innings. Not the ideal send-off for him as captain, but he has been a terrific leader for Sri Lanka and he's got the team to a better place than he found it.

Looks like we can't bring the presentation to you today, but thanks for being with us. If I can hazard a guess I'd say Phil Hughes will win the man of the match, and Nuwan Kulasekara is the player of the series, but Hughes has an outside shot of taking that out too. Those would by my two picks anyway.
This series is shared, but there's more to come from the tour, when the first of two Twenty20s kicks off on the 26th at the SCG. Join us then for more commentary.
Australia won by 32 runs
Player of the match is Phillip Hughes, AUS
